article_title: Military Forces From Chad, Niger Enter Nigeria
article_text:
NIAMEY, Niger—A Chadian general has confirmed that military forces from Chad and Niger have gone into northeast Nigeria to attack Boko Haram.

Gen. Zakaria Ngobongue told the Associated Press in Chad on Monday that the troop movement marks a second front in northeast Nigeria against the extremist Islamic group. Soldiers opened the first front recently.

A local resident said on Monday that hundreds of troops from Chad and Niger...
